ui5lab.wl.pdf.name: PDF library
ui5lab.wl.pdf.description: A library with a PDF control that will show a PDF based on a base64 data uri

PDF.name: PDF
PDF.description: A PDF Control that will show a PDF based on a base64 uri. This allows you to show uploaded PDF's immediately instead of uploading it to the server. No need for a static file url anymore.

samples.name: Upload PDF
samples.description: Upload a PDF and show it immediately as a base 64 data uri
